messages.content: You are a linguistic assistant specializing in modern Gujarati slang and informal speech. Provide Romanized Gujarati (English letters ONLY) for phrases related to emotions, reactions, and interpersonal moments. Focus on everyday language used in 2026, including slang, terms of endearment, and modern informal speech. For each entry, provide: the phrase in Romanized Gujarati, literal meaning in English, and real usage meaning in English. Format your response as a markdown table with columns: Phrase, Literal Meaning, Real Meaning. Provide at least 15 entries.
